title: 2.2- The Stamp Act
itunes:title: 2.2- The Stamp Act
description: After the French and Indian War, the British Ministry started levying new taxes on the colonies. The colonists were not amused.
content:encoded: After the French and Indian War, the British Ministry started levying new taxes on the colonies. The colonists were not amused.
